h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you spot the Black Loong raising his weapons high in a slow manner while they crackle to life, it’s a sign he’s going to bang them together slowly three times, causing explosions in the air that gradually increase in range. This is a good time to sprint to safety and use your medicines while you wait for the attack to end.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you spot the Black Loong raising his weapons high in a slow manner while they crackle to life, it’s a sign he’s going to bang them together slowly three times, causing explosions in the air that gradually increase in range. This is a good time to sprint to safety and use your medicines while you wait for the attack to end.
